```{r}
#| label: set-up

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  tidy=FALSE,     # display code as typed
  size="small",   # slightly smaller font for code
  message=FALSE)   

# load packages here
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(mdsr)
library(stringr)
library(robotstxt)
library(tidytext)
```

```{r}
# check permissions ----------------------------------------------------------
songs_url <- "https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~dtompkin/music/list/Best9.html"
paths_allowed(songs_url)
# scrape the table -----------------------------------------------------------
songs <- songs_url |>
  read_html() |>
  html_elements("table") |>
  purrr::pluck(2) |>
  html_table()

songs
```
